A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is\, without a doubt\, the worst Star Wars movie ever.  The plot is lazy\, and the dialogue is ridiculous.  They took these brilliant new actors\, Boyega\, Isaac\, Ridley and made them be a part of this pile of garbage.  I was in a theater where people cheered and swooned and gasped...all as a function of their nostalgia.  It didn't matter that they were watching a bad movie\, if it was self-referential and contained cameos.  Rent it if you feel you must watch it\, but prepare to be disappointed by this addition to the canon of Star Wars.
